def_cn: 正统的；规范的；广为接受的
def_en: Orthodox beliefs, methods, or systems are ones which are accepted or used by most people.

def_cn: （人）正统派的，传统的，循规蹈矩的
def_en: If you describe someone as orthodox, you mean that they hold the older and more traditional ideas of their religion or party.
The Orthodox churches are Christian churches in Eastern Europe which separated from the western church in the eleventh century.
